alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 2:45PM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...North to northwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts 55 to 60 MPH expected. * WHERE...Laramie County including the cities of Cheyenne and Pine Bluffs. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Friday. The strongest winds are expected later this evening into early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
